69311.「天よ……晴れ呼びの儀の祭具は そろいました。\n その労苦に報い 雨を斬り 雲:
O heavens, the rituals of the invocation have been prepared. For their hardship, let them break the rain, dispel the clouds, and once
more peer up at the stars in the clear sky.

69312.「毎年 今月今夜 この時しか会えぬ \n 分かたれし 恋人たちのため\n 天の川:
Every year, this month, tonight, for the only
time we can see our divided Lovers, build a
heavenly floating bridge over the Milky Way...

69314.「雨が やんだ……。\n 空の黒雲が 晴れていく……。:
The rain has stopped... and the black clouds
in the sky are clearing.

69315.「おお……ヒコボシ様！\n まさか こちらに お姿を\n お見せになられるとは…:
Oh, Mr. Hikoboshi! I had not expected to see
you here.

69316.「心優しき 旅の方……。\n 私たちの従者 カササギのチカラとなり\n よくぞ:
Kind-hearted traveler, you have done well to
stop the rain by becoming the strength of our
follower, the Magpie.

69317.「……私は 縁結びの神 ヒコボシ。\n 毎年 この七夕の日に 天の川を渡り\n:
I am Hikoboshi, the god of marriage. Every year on this Tanabata day, I am the one who crosses the Milky Way to bestow blessings on
Lovers all over the world.

69318.「今年は 折り悪く 突然の雨に見舞われ \n オリヒメと会うのは 来年まで\n:
This year, we had a bad year, with sudden
rain, and I thought I would have to wait until
next year to see Orihime, but...

69319.「あなたがたの 晴れ呼びの儀のおかげで\n 天の浮き橋が架かり こうして\n 天:
Thanks to your "Sunny Calling Ceremony," the
floating bridge of heaven was built and we
were able to cross the Milky Way.

69320.「……それにしても\n オリヒメの姿が 見えませんね。: But I still can't see Orihime.

69322.「ごっめんね～。\n 今日 着てくる服を選んでたら\n すっかり 遅れちゃったよ:
I'm sorry~! I was choosing what to wear today
and I'm totally late~!

69323.「いいんですよ オリリン。\n だけど あなたは 何を着ても美しいのですから\n:
It's okay, Ori Wori. But you're beautiful no
matter what you wear, so there's no need to be
so...

69324.「やぁ～ん ヒコリンったら 言わせないで……。: Oh, no! Hickoryn! Don't make me say it...

69325.「毎年 この時しか会えないんだから\n いちばんキレイな私を 見てほしいの……<:
This is the only time I get to see you every
year, so I want you to see me at my most
beautiful...<heart>.

69330.「そうだったのですね……ありがとう。 \n あなたが いなければ 私たちの再会は:
I see...thank you. Without you, our reunion
would have been postponed until next year.

69331.「私たちが会える 貴重なチャンスを \n 取り戻してくれた あなたに\n せめて:
Let me at least thank you for giving us back
this precious chance to meet.

69333.「そして 星が 何度巡ろうとも\n その縁が 変わりなく続きますように……。:
And may the stars turn again and again, and
may the bond between us continue unbroken...

69334.「……それと 私たちから もうひとつ\n あなたに 贈り物があるのですよ。: ...and we have one more gift for you.

69337.「そして 星が 何度巡ろうとも\n すばらしい恋路を たどるように\n あなたた:
And let the stars guide your destiny to follow
the path of great love, no matter how many
times they turn...

69338.「……それと 私たちから もうひとつ\n 贈り物があるのですよ。: ...and we have another gift for you.

69339.「カササギに 預けておきますから\n 後で 受け取ってくださいね。:
I'll leave it with Kasasagi and you can pick
it up later.

69346.「……そうそう オリヒメ。\n 私たちが会えたのは こちらにいる\n 旅の方のお:
...Oh yes, Orihime. It is thanks to the
traveler here that we were able to meet.

69347.「心優しき あなたのもとに\n いつか ステキなご縁が 訪れますよう\n 縁結び:
As the god of marriage, let me bestow my
blessing on you so that someday a wonderful
match will come to you with a kind heart...

69348.「カササギに 預けておきますから\n あなたに いつか 大切な人ができた時\n:
I'll leave it with Kasasagi so that one day,
when you have someone special in your life,
you can use it together.

69349.「心優しき あなたたちの仲が\n これからも よりいっそう深まるように\n 縁結:
As the god of marriage, I bestow my blessing
on you so that you may grow even closer
together...

69350.「本当に ありがとうございました。\n それでは 私たちは 天に戻り\n 今年の:
Thank you so much. Now we will return to
heaven to share our limited time together this
year.

69351.「えぇ～？ ヒコリン～。\n 今年の天の川 とってもきれいだし\n もう少し こ:
Eh~? HIKORIN~. The Milky Way is so beautiful
this year, let's stay here and admire it a
little longer~<heart>.

69352.「ふふっ。そうしましょうか。\n しかし この 美しくかがやく天の川も \n オ:
Hmmm. I'll do that. But even this beautiful,
shimmering Milky Way is a bit dim in the
presence of Ori Wori <heart>.
